title: Agent Heartbeat Monitor Tool
description: Develop a standalone agent or CLI tool that reads all agents' mailbox heartbeats at regular intervals, detects missed heartbeats, and raises alerts or auto-restarts stalled agents.
benefits: Automated detection and reporting of stalled agents
Reduced manual oversight and faster recovery from failures
tasks: Design data collector for mailbox heartbeats
Implement alerting mechanism (e.g., email, logs, dashboard highlight)
Add auto-restart capability via TaskNexus or dreamctl
Write unit tests and integration tests for failure scenarios
